attributes.action: Reverse the revoking of  Israeli arms license
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the recent revoking of weapons license against israel  the undersigned believe that Israel has the right to defend itself and that the UK should be showing support for Israel, and should supply replacement parts and other equipment for Sa'ar 4.5 gunships that participated in Operation Cast Lead in the Gaza Strip earlier this year.

Since day 1 Israel has been under attack from her neighbours and the Uk needs to accept the truth of this and recognise  that Israel and the Uk have the same enemys.
